content: give me the 10 lines of any story which can motivate me and made my day

Here are 10 lines from a motivational story to brighten your day:

1. "Every great dream begins with a dreamer, and you are the dreamer of your life."
2. "The only way to do great work is to love what you do, and I know you do."
3. "You are not just building a life, you are building a legacy that will outlast you."
4. "Believe you can and you're halfway there, and I believe in you."
5. "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams."
6. "You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great."
7. "Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life."
8. "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts."
9. "You are stronger than you seem, braver than you believe, and smarter than you think."
10. "Remember why you started, and let that fire fuel your journey to greatness."

I hope these lines inspire and motivate you to tackle your day with confidence and enthusiasm!
